title: Danzig 4p
description:
Danzig 4p is the fourth studio album by Danzig. It was released in 1994 on American Recordings. It is notable as the band&#039;s final album on American Recordings, and as the last to feature the original lineup of John Christ (guitar), Eerie Von (bass), and Chuck Biscuits (drums).
